ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Hello all
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Owen, I do not know anyone on the Brell server.  We have a gay guild on Rodcet Nife.  If you ever think about switching servers come join up with us  =) We
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Owen,
I do not know anyone on the Brell server. We have a gay guild on Rodcet
Nife. If you ever think about switching servers come join up with us =)
We have people who would powerlevel your characters up to where you are
now. We have a few bears in our guild (including my lover) and are
accepting of everyone as long as they accept us (even breeders =P). The
guild is more centered around the game than it is our sexuality. The guild
is a place where we can play free of harassment and when people do harass us
we have the rest of the guild to back us up. We are over 50 strong now in
the Mystic Alliance. There is also a bear specific guild on the Lanys T'Vyl
server. I just recently created a character there and joined them but they
are a smaller guild.

Andy Cottrell
Taren Despottrell
Mystic Alliance Guildleader
41st Barbarian Shaman

We also have a website. http://mysticalliance.im1ru12.org If you want a
member account email me and I'll set it up. We also have a guild mailing
list on egroups(which is changing to Yahoo) look for mysticalliance.



Owen DuBose wrote:

> Just wanted to say hello to everyone. I just joined up here and
> wanted to give some information.
>
> My nameis Owen DuBose and I'm a relatively new player to EQ but a
> lifelong sci-fi, fantasy and RPG fan. My partner Dan Watson and I
> both play EQ on the Brell Serilis server and are looking for other
> gay/lesbian friends to meet on our server.
>
> My primary character is an Ogre ShadowKnight named Grackk, level 12,
> currently sittinga round Neriak (a/k/a Scrunchyville) trying to level
> up fletching, smithing and brewing skills while taking side trips to
> Lavastorm to kill drakes and rock dervishes :)
>
> My secondary character is a Human Cleric named Dhalgren who is
> currentl hanging in N. Qeynos taking trips to Blackburrow to harass
> some the gnolls. He is 6th level.
>
> Dan's primary character is a 13th lvl DE Necro named Staben who is, I
> believe currently blitzing around E Commons/N ro/ S Ro and Oasis.
>
> Dan has a secondary character he hasn't even played yet, lol.
>
> We are very interested in the possibilty of being a part of a g/l
> guild on Brell or starting one if there isn't one. We are also
> interested in locating other "bear" and "big bear" buddies on Brell
> to group with or talk to.
>
> Feel free to to email me at bigbear@...!
>
> Thanks
>
> Owen
>
